▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲classic game ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲
Ever, a popular global TV game consoles and handheld game consoles game, it had caused a sensation that is a major event in the history of of the game. It may seem simple but it is constantly changing, and addictive. I believe most users also have to remember the game obsession for it.
Today, the full return of classic Game， Let your memories of your handheld gaming era by phone.

▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ old but new game play ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲
Players can achieve the operation of the game in the bottom of the screen function buttons. In addition, the game also set a touch version, perfectly comfortable gaming experience for players through the easy-to-use touch screen, slide to the left, slide right, slide down and click on the screen to air box the left, move right, move down and transform action players through this operation to the whereabouts of the box is placed in the proper location.

▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ 3D experience ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲
The game has two modes 2D, 25D, 3D games, available to the player 360 degrees rotatable 3D perspective to the game. Game, simply slide the screen and click to operate the game, beautiful screen, simple operation, and beautiful music to bring you a new experience.

▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲variety of styles ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲
Of the box tired of the monotonous how to do? It does not matter, for a right. Game set in a variety of materials in the box of a variety of materials, crystal, glass, wood box you choose Xpress experience, relax.


▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲nine achievements ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲
The game nine achievements alternative levels, players no longer need a hard to attack checkpoints and headache. The game uses memory accumulation, record players each to eliminate the number of rows, accumulated to a certain number of lines you can get different achievements.
Achievement Medal:
Cumulative elimination of 10 rows by nine achievements
Cumulative elimination of 100 lines by eight achievements
Accumulated eliminate 300 line was seven achievements
Cumulative elimination of 500 lines by six achievements
Total elimination of 1000 lines, was five achievements
Accumulated eliminate the 2000 line, won four achievements
Cumulative elimination of 3,000 lines, were three achievements
Accumulated eliminate the 4000 line, were two achievements
Accumulated eliminate 5000 lines, was an achievement
Have the courage to challenge you! More achievements waiting for you to challenge oh, pick up the phone to act quickly!

▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲global ranking ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲
